about_the_game:
The piano arrangement album of Little Busters! and Kud Wafter! is now available digitally on Steam!
With 10 tracks in both FLAC and MP3 formats, download the Little Busters!/Kud Wafter Piano Arrangement Album "ripresa" now and enjoy the beautiful piano renditions of your favorite music from Little Busters! and Kud Wafter!
In addition, the sheet music for all ten tracks is also included with this release in PDF format for you to get started with playing your favorite Little Busters! music!

* This soundtrack DLC is a digital version of the original 2013 album Little Busters!/Kud Wafter Piano Arrangement Album "ripresa" (KLSA-0089) from the game's Japanese limited edition release and features 10 tracks.

Little Busters!/Kud Wafter Piano Arrangement Album "ripresa"

1. BOYS DON'T CRY

2. Little Busters!
3. Magic Ensemble
4. Exotic Toybox
5. one's future
6. Just One Magic Word
7. Faraway (Haruka Kanata)
8. Saya's song
9. Stardust (Hoshikuzu)
10. Let's Return
